strapiPost.title: Art on the Bricks This Thursday
strapiPost.content:
Art on the Bricks in downtown Rogers is this Thursday, September 8, from 4:30-7:30p, and it is titled A Celebration of Newcomers Welcomed to Northwest Arkansas. 

  • The event: Art on the Bricks Art Walk takes place on the second Thursday of every month and is an element of Downtown Rogersâ€™ vibrant arts and entertainment community, with twenty-plus local businesses contributing to the evolving character of Rogers.
  • Sneak peek: This Thursday, there will be percussion drumming that explores the intersection of music and art for the whole family and a balloon sculpture photo backdrop in the Rogers Experimental house designed to enhance the party's mood, among other exhibitions. 

Click HERE to see the list of participating locations, view art to be displayed, and learn more about this free event.
